com.splunk
Class Input

java.lang.Object
  com.splunk.Resource
      com.splunk.Entity
          com.splunk.Input
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MonitorInput, ScriptInput, TcpInput, TcpSplunkInput, UdpInput, WindowsActiveDirectoryInput, WindowsEventLogInput, WindowsPerfmonInput, WindowsRegistryInput, WindowsWmiInput
public class Input
extends Entity

The Input class represents a data input. This class is the base for all typed Input classes and is also used when Splunk does not recognize an input type (input kind).
